entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.2°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming partly cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023
